metadata.description: Professional AI-generated visual assets for tech company website

assets.name: hero-bg-network
assets.prompt: Ultra-modern abstract digital network background, flowing data streams and glowing nodes, color palette of bright blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF on dark charcoal #3F4447 background, futuristic technology aesthetic, clean professional design, high resolution 2560x1440, cinematic lighting, depth of field, photorealistic render, trending on artstation
assets.negative_prompt: cluttered, busy, text, logos, people, faces, amateur, low quality

assets.name: hero-bg-geometric
assets.prompt: Minimalist geometric abstract background, floating 3D shapes and polygons, gradient from bright blue #1E9FF2 to cyan #5FDFDF, dark charcoal #3F4447 accents, modern tech aesthetic, clean composition, professional corporate design, 2560x1440 resolution, studio lighting, sharp focus, ultra detailed
assets.negative_prompt: cluttered, messy, chaotic, text, watermarks, low resolution

assets.name: hero-bg-data-viz
assets.prompt: Sleek data visualization abstract background, glowing charts and graphs elements, circuit board patterns, color scheme of electric blue #1E9FF2 and vibrant cyan #5FDFDF on charcoal #3F4447 base, futuristic dashboard aesthetic, professional tech design, 2560x1440 high resolution, cinematic composition, photorealistic 3D render
assets.negative_prompt: messy, cluttered, amateur, cartoonish, low quality, text

assets.name: hero-bg-metallic
assets.prompt: Premium metallic technology background, brushed metal texture with blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF lighting effects, dark charcoal #3F4447 base, abstract tech patterns, sophisticated modern design, enterprise-grade aesthetic, 2560x1440 resolution, professional studio lighting, ultra sharp, photorealistic
assets.negative_prompt: rusty, old, vintage, cluttered, low quality, amateur

assets.name: hero-bg-particles
assets.prompt: Dynamic particle flow abstract background, glowing particles in motion, energy streams in bright blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF colors, dark charcoal #3F4447 background, cutting-edge technology aesthetic, clean modern composition, 2560x1440 high resolution, volumetric lighting, photorealistic render, professional grade
assets.negative_prompt: static, boring, cluttered, messy, text, low resolution

assets.name: portfolio-opportunity-bot-dashboard
assets.prompt: Modern AI chatbot dashboard interface mockup, dark theme UI with blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF accent colors, conversation threads, analytics graphs, clean professional design, realistic software interface, high detail, flat design with depth, 1920x1080 resolution, professional UI/UX design
assets.negative_prompt: cluttered, amateur, outdated, low quality, blurry

assets.name: portfolio-opportunity-bot-chat
assets.prompt: Sleek AI chat interface mockup, modern messaging UI with blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF highlights, chatbot conversation bubbles, typing indicators, dark charcoal #3F4447 background, professional SaaS design, clean layout, 1920x1080 resolution, high fidelity mockup, modern UI design
assets.negative_prompt: messy, cluttered, old-fashioned, low quality, amateur

assets.name: portfolio-spiritatlas-profile
assets.prompt: Premium mobile app interface mockup on iPhone 15 Pro, spiritual wellness app, profile screen with meditation stats, blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF color scheme, modern iOS design, clean minimalist UI, realistic phone mockup, professional app design, 1600x1200 resolution, studio lighting on device
assets.negative_prompt: cluttered, amateur, outdated phone, low quality, messy

assets.name: portfolio-spiritatlas-meditation
assets.prompt: Beautiful mobile meditation app interface on modern smartphone, guided meditation screen with wave animations, calming blue #1E9FF2 gradients, cyan #5FDFDF accents, peaceful design aesthetic, professional UI/UX, realistic phone mockup, 1600x1200 resolution, premium app design
assets.negative_prompt: cluttered, chaotic, amateur, low quality, unrealistic

assets.name: portfolio-analytics-dashboard
assets.prompt: Professional analytics dashboard interface, modern data visualization, charts and graphs in blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF colors, dark theme with charcoal #3F4447 background, clean layout, enterprise-grade UI design, 1920x1080 resolution, high detail, realistic software interface, professional design
assets.negative_prompt: cluttered, messy, amateur, outdated, low quality

assets.name: portfolio-cloud-architecture
assets.prompt: Modern cloud architecture diagram visualization, AWS/Azure infrastructure, isometric 3D elements, blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF color scheme, clean professional infographic style, dark charcoal #3F4447 background, technical but accessible, 1920x1080 resolution, high quality illustration

assets.name: portfolio-ecommerce-platform
assets.prompt: Sleek e-commerce platform dashboard mockup, modern admin interface, product management screen, sales analytics, blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF accents, professional SaaS design, clean layout, realistic UI, 1920x1080 resolution, high fidelity mockup, enterprise-grade design
assets.negative_prompt: cluttered, outdated, amateur, messy, low quality

assets.name: portfolio-api-docs
assets.prompt: Modern API documentation portal interface, developer-focused design, code snippets with syntax highlighting, blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF theme, dark mode interface, professional tech documentation layout, 1920x1080 resolution, clean typography, high quality UI design
assets.negative_prompt: cluttered, confusing, amateur, outdated, low quality

assets.name: icon-custom-dev
assets.prompt: Modern icon for custom software development, code brackets and gear symbol, bright blue #1E9FF2 and cyan #5FDFDF gradient, flat design with subtle depth, clean professional style, 512x512 resolution, transparent background, crisp edges, vector-style illustration
assets.negative_prompt: 3D, realistic, cluttered, messy, low quality, blurry

assets.name: icon-ai-ml
assets.prompt: Sleek AI and machine learning icon, neural network nodes connected, blue #1E9FF2 to cyan #5FDFDF gradient, modern flat design, professional tech icon style, 512x512 resolution, transparent background, clean geometric shapes, high quality vector-style

assets.name: icon-cloud-architecture

assets.name: icon-data-engineering

assets.name: icon-security

assets.name: icon-mobile-dev

assets.name: divider-gradient-wave
